content.html: Hiding our vices from our children only adds to the stigma as well as their curiosity to try. I believe in strict regulations on marketing but believe in having open discussions with your kids. My cannabis grows next to our tomatoes in our garden & I explain its use to them.
content.value:
Hiding our vices from our children only adds to the stigma as well as their curiosity to try. I believe in strict regulations on marketing but believe in having open discussions with your kids.

My cannabis grows next to our tomatoes in our garden & I explain its use to them.
